channel.title: Barrick Gold Corporation on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Barrick Gold Corporation on FinanClub

item.title: 1049 GOLD
item.description: score:1049 Chances: Barrick Gold aims to restart operations at the Porgera gold mine in Papua New Guinea later this year, potentially increasing gold production. The signing of the New Reko Diq agreement in Pakistan and the progress on the Reko Diq copper-gold project could lead to future production and revenue growth.
